column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We ordered the pork paella as well and asked to add chicken too.  When our order came out
column2: there was no chicken in it but we weren't going to say anything about the chicken not being in the entree. The paella is amazing though. It's the only thing I have to eat every time.  At the end of our meal
column3: Hector comes back with a trio of desserts and tells us
column4: "I realized I forgot to put chicken in your paella so I know this isn't the same but please have these desserts on us."  He had a gluten free chocolate cake
column5: mango (or was it peach?) sorbet and a fruit empanada.
